channel.title: A carpet ban?
channel.description: Is anyone familiar with this term? It is some sort of ban for the RSPS I play. I haven't been able to find anything else about it on other gaming forums

item.title: A carpet ban?
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:3, topic:547339”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=666246.msg4454243#msg4454243 date=1413678198]
My guess would be it either means an IP ban or a ban that is given to a bunch of people for breaking a specific rule. For example, if someone is creating a bunch of accounts to do something, they might “carpet ban” all of them with a set of IP bans. Or if there are a bunch of people abusing a glitch and they managed to trace people that did, they might “carpet ban” all of those accounts.
[/quote]
Or they could quietly ban you and sweep your mangled corpse under the carpet and act like it didn’t happen. :rolleyes:[/quote]
I like this answer lmao.

Read full topic

item.title: A carpet ban?
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

Davidi2:

My guess would be it either means an IP ban or a ban that is given to a bunch of people for breaking a specific rule. For example, if someone is creating a bunch of accounts to do something, they might “carpet ban” all of them with a set of IP bans. Or if there are a bunch of people abusing a glitch and they managed to trace people that did, they might “carpet ban” all of those accounts.

That makes sense in this situation, thanks.
Anybody else know anything?

Read full topic

item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Davidi2:

My guess would be it either means an IP ban or a ban that is given to a bunch of people for breaking a specific rule. For example, if someone is creating a bunch of accounts to do something, they might “carpet ban” all of them with a set of IP bans. Or if there are a bunch of people abusing a glitch and they managed to trace people that did, they might “carpet ban” all of those accounts.

Or they could quietly ban you and sweep your mangled corpse under the carpet and act like it didn’t happen. :rolleyes:
